aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.paragraph1: I've been a fullstack developer for {experienceTime} and a student of Internet Systems at Univali.
aboutMe.paragraph2: I have extensive experience with front-end, but I also work with back-end and application architecture.
aboutMe.paragraph3: Lately, I've been focusing more and more on Cloud. Understanding how applications scale, communicate and remain resilient in infrastructure is what attracts me most today.
